website_summaries.verdict: A solid day bag choice that gets top marks for its casual yet stylish appeal.
pros: Consumers love the attractive and versatile look of this bag, as well as the fact that it's durable
cons: Some remarked that there were issues over time, such as straps loosening and the water bottle holder getting stressed and worn

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today, 4/17/19, and I’m impressed. Some of the reviews said a laptop couldn’t fit and mine is a Lenovo 11” and it fits just enough with my folders, charger, mouse, iPad Pro and business cards. Material feels really good and I look forward to wearing/carrying this around.
customer_reviews.author: GooN

customer_reviews.title: I can say this is one of the best sling backpacks I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Having owned this for several months, I can say this is one of the best sling backpacks I've ever used. Pros: - Durable (mostly). - Strap is adjustable. - Lots of pockets. Cons: - Water bottle holder mesh tore from elastic on first use with a regular sized water bottle. Other thoughts: - Over time the strap has started to loosen up. Adjustments are needed daily vs. weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Louis E.

customer_reviews.title: Great value.  Be careful about size before you order.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you cannot beat this bag. It's not huge, make sure to check the measurements to make sure this bag will be big enough for your use. I got the large, and the measurements listed are accurate. Will not fit a full size laptop, but will easily fit a smaller laptop (11"?) and other items. The quality is amazing for this price. It's built very well, all seams good, no loose threads or missing areas. Holds a decent amount of notebook sized items, has inside pockets for smaller items. Strap can be moved to L or R side depending on how you want to wear it. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kosloske

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bag of all time
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of this bag! The material is comfortable and has just the right amount of stiffness. Great as a day pack and for sleepovers. Having just one strap is great, because I typically only use one. If I want both arms free, it's easy to sling it across as a messenger bag. It actually barely fits my 14" Dell Latitude 7490 laptop, though not in the sleeve. Honestly wasn't expecting it, but good that I could carry my laptop (albeit with minimal protection) in a pinch. I bought the black version, and it's as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: U

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great looks, with minor glitches
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Great storage layout. I fit everything from a 15" laptop backpack into this after downsizing to a 13" laptop. Magnetic buttons broke on 2nd trip like other users complained about, but due to the magnetic nature still work for now. Belt is always working loose and carrying lower as a result. I will sew a secondary handle on top of where the main strap meets the belt to combat this, so the bag will carry higher when I hook my hand through it. Highly recommend a cord/misc item organizer. Wish the car key clip was better located.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go for "Large", very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bag. Bought a "medium" first of the message sling and it was jusy an inch too small for my folder or any notebook I tried to put in it, large was just big enough and doesn't look much bigger aesthetically. Had to put them side-by-side just to see a difference. Even if you have a small tablet, I would just say go large. It's smaller than my last bag but the shape makes it more accommodating to what I put in it, because the round top of my last bag doesn't like folders. Very compact, and stylish. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag for men and women alike!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. It has many pockets and is made of a very nice heavy canvas fabric. I have gotten all kinds of compliments on it. My step-daughter liked it so much we wound up buying a second one for her. I have also had several people at work comment on it wanting to know where I got it. It is the perfect size to allow you to carry a lot, yet small enough to take anywhere you go. I love the over one shoulder strap. So much easier to grab a go than a normal back-pack and has a nice carry handle for when I'm just running from the car to the house. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Best bag at a great price
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite bags I've used. There is plenty of storage space with many different compartments all over, more than an even use but it's nice to have options. It's overall size is still pretty small so it doesn't look like you're lugging around a school bag. I have the dark gray color and it looks classy enough with the leather straps, I only don't like how the front straps curl up at the ends though might be something that happens with all straps like that. Shoulder strap is comfortable, and after a few months of use it shows no sign of being cheaply made. Quite happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful heavy duty bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and very well made heavy duty canvas messenger bag! It has an adjustable strap where you can choose to wear it on the right shoulder or left shoulder. It has metal magnet clips in the front that look like belt loops and not to mention, pockets galore!!! 3 big pockets to and 5 or so smaller paockets. Everything about this bag is amazing. I plan on getting another one in a different color. My Amazon Fire 10’ tablet fit beautifully with no issues. I’m 5’1 petite female 100lbs and this bag looked perfect for my size. Not too bulky. I bought the Medium bag seeing as I am petite.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkster

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Bag
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the large would be too bulky to carry back and forth to work, so first I ordered the "medium." I returned the "medium" and reordered the "large" size. The quality is great. The khaki color is nice. The "medium" does fit a Microsoft Surface, but just barely. The size up has a bit more head space when zipped closed. Side by side the large size really does not look that much bigger, but fits a lot more (see the product review pictures, someone else already posted a really good comparison).
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously unreliable
customer_reviews.text: On the one hand the large bag is perfect. Beautiful and just awesome. On the other, the metal clasp holding the bag onto me broke 3 months into owning it. I get paid cash and often have that in my bag. I also ride a motorcycle. Had my bag hit the ground the way it did, while I was on my bike... I'd be furious. That bas led me to want to repurchase for the look but hold the metal pieces together with an added carabiner... although I just need a better quality bag
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great for Small Oxygen Tanks
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a number of small bags designed for carrying Oxygen tanks. I am tall and big. Everything I tried was too small. They all put undue strain on my neck. This bag was big enough for my M6 O2 tanks. I like the design, the extra books and the bag's seeming sturdiness. Being big and tall I had to add an extra small strap to achiever my full goal. Now I can carry my tank over the front, withe strap crossing my body. Being in front means I don't need to remove it when sitting. The positioning removes strain on my neck. My am completely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Evans Lee

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems fine, but wow is it small.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot overstate how small this bag is. I ordered the large size and it barely fit my 9.7" iPad, and coupled with a toiletry bag was completely stuffed. It's so small as to be odd and conspicuous on an adult. It even looks small worn by my seven year old son. The product shot of it on a guy's back is misleading. The backpack is 13"x10" and covers most of his back, so either the product model is four feet tall and has a 24" waist or they got creative with the scaling. Quality seemed pretty good for the limited time I was with it.
customer_reviews.author: OrangeFurious

customer_reviews.title: This is the bag you are looking for
customer_reviews.text: My man is picky with his fashion. He likes expensive things and I like a good bargain. This bag was exactly what we needed. He loves it, it fits so well, no rolling or sliding like some crossbody backpacks I’ve had before. It is small but it fits everything he needs and more. I love that it has soooo many pockets, it’s great for someone like him who likes to know where things are when he needs them. I also love that the strap switches to either side so easily. He had a shoulder injury and we had to switch it to accommodate the sling, absolutely genius design add on!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted/Needed
customer_reviews.text: The item was all that I had hoped. It is roomy enough for my 13” MacBook Pro, as well as for my iPad Pro 12.9 (2018) and iPad Mini and assorted gear. I plan to carry one iPad and my Nikon DSLR in it for most occasions. It has lots of pockets, a place for a water bottle. I carry it with me incessantly, if not obsessively.
customer_reviews.author: WriterFLP

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bag for college
customer_reviews.text: Nice little bag for college. It fits my tablet and its keyboard, my smaller textbook, a notebook and pens, my phone, water bottle or drink (I can fit it inside depending on the size). It looks nice and feels pretty solid. I haven't had it very long so I can't tell you how it holds up over time, so far so good though. I'm not carrying around any large textbooks or my laptop, they wouldn't fit in the bag, but for this term it fits everything I need into it. I think it's an attractive bag and I like how many pockets it has.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJane

customer_reviews.title: finally the perfect carry on travel bag
customer_reviews.text: pleasantly surprised of the quality and design of this bag for the price. perfect bag for my travel needs. it does hang low when carried over shoulder on your back but easily fixed by folding up the strap and securing with a couple of zip ties to shorten it. works great and looks fabulous. i bought the khaki and have recommended to all my buds. love it! my backpack is too big and my small carry on is awkward. this carries all the necessities without being bulky and has pockets and compartments up the ying yang highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Larry K

customer_reviews.title: Compact, looks good, and fits all my "stuff".
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a more compact day bag for an upcoming trip, and this is working out well. I was also looking for something that strapped across my body, instead of over the shoulders or a double-strap backpack. I normally carry a medium sized messenger bag, but I wanted something smaller and more secure/closer fitting to my body for walking around the city all day. This bag fits all my necessary items for the day (tablet, wallet, snacks, water bottle, umbrella, etc.), yet is small and light enough that I don't notice it on my back. I'm actually thinking about getting a second one in a lighter color.
customer_reviews.author: James Fee

customer_reviews.title: tons of pockets
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, and I am a tough customer when it comes to purses and back packs. Nice selection of colors to choose from, excellent stitching/assembly/materials. I've gotten numerous compliments about the bag. It's a good size to carry a significant amount of stuff - books, beanies, pens, laptop/iPad, extra sweater, makeup stuff, small purchases, etc. It is a cross body strap, but it's adjustable and there are multiple steel rings on the pack to attach the straps to, so you can fiddle with it to get it just the way you want. Great bag, I should buy several more in different colors. Don't hesitate to buy this good gear.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hull

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, except for...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag! My only problem with it (and this is my own personal issue) is the heaviness of the canvas; the bag is heavy to me even empty.--I'll get used to it, though. I got the smaller sling bag in the purplish/mauve--It's a really cool color! The company "Leaper Direct" says it is a small business "which makes 100% effort to satisfy its customers"--and I think they would if I had a real problem with it. I'll support any small business that earns it. Also, the bag is very well made (arranged and sewn) and should last a very long time. Worth the somewhat steep price.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Roomy.
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman who hates purses. They're all either way too big (as in: you lose all your stuff and can't find what you're looking for when you need it) or not big enough to carry a wallet, sunglasses case, and reader. This is PERFECT for a writer--my EDC includes a pen case, two notebooks for drafts, a planner, a wallet, sunglasses, keys, phone, Kindle Paperwhite, and a few other little things (flashlight, etc). Keeps everything nicely organized, too. And it's sturdy--I don't feel like it's going to rip or fall apart under the load it carries.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Renee Chism

customer_reviews.title: Zippers and pockets galore, oh my!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A place for everything and everything in its place. My tablet, phone, wallet, keys and a myriad of odds and ends fit securely in their place. No more fumbling around in the bottom of a bag. It fits comfortably; I didn’t even need to adjust the strap. Made of quality materials and sporting a great design, the craftsmanship is apparent. Now granted, I’ve just started using it, so I’ll update this review after I’ve had some significant real life experience with it.
customer_reviews.author: RevB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag, but watch out for those buckles!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag so much! It holds a lot of my stuff and has several pockets to keep everything organized. I will say to be careful when swinging it around your shoulder though. I swung it around off my back to open it and pull out my phone and the prong to the decorative buckle on the front gouged my arm. I have a gnarly and jagged scar on my arm from that scratch. It got me good.
customer_reviews.author: photonut

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag so much
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve purchased this exact same bag. I get nonstop compliments on it. For the money, it’s absolutely amazing. I find it worth so much more. The only reason I replaced it is because I’m very hard on the poor bag and it got filthy. I mean lots of throwing around at outdoor festivals, tossed on the floor when I’m not thinking, etc. The only issue I had was overloading the pocket on the large outside flap. The zipper finally broke. Probably a cheap fix at the tailor. Most assuredly an extremely cheap and easy fix if you can sew. i did neither and it still looked great
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! I need them to make a bigger one so I can use it for my life lol! It makes a great diaper bag because there are a bunch of pockets, I can put my cell phone in one of the side pockets (abiet the pocket doesn't close) and my daughter's cup in the other. It fits three size 4 diapers, 5 size two diapers, one changing mat, two changes of clothes, one wallet, one phone, keys, wipes, DS and one game box, a decent amount of snacks, and ane or two small toys/chewies/paci with the largest size.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Blake Vermette

customer_reviews.title: This is a hugely versatile bag
customer_reviews.text: There are so many pockets. That is just great. I love pockets. The material used for the bag is strong yet soft, the bag has a handle, yet has a strap to use as a messenger bag, and the quality of the way it was put together is outstanding. The zippers are very good. So many things have cheap zippers, but not this. I haven't been able to use a purse for years and have been relying on fanny packs or just a wallet in my pocket, but I will be using this from now on. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: P. L Slice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sized for Commuting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for commuting to work. It has a great number of pockets to organize my belongings for my commute. The only drawback for me was that it isn't quite as deep as I expected. I purchased to carry my tablet and my lunch as my previous bag was only 2 inch wide and though this is 3 inch I still worry my lunch is getting squished. I have solved part of the problem by putting my sandwich in a plastic container instead of just wrap. Overall it's a very sturdy bag to get me back and forth to work.
customer_reviews.author: Robbyn M. Paradis

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag can fit a lot into it, but it doesn't look huge. It has both an umbrella pouch and a water bottle holder. Along with several pouches that fit anything from tablets to large books. It is made of nice canvas materials so it is not waterproof. It is easy to swing around on your back and get to the front pouches while sitting. The one thing is that the buckles are not buckles but are magnetic clasps that easily snap on and off, so I would not but anything valuable in there.
customer_reviews.author: BrinleyH98

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I do not use it as a cross body bag but carry it on one shoulder and it does not slide off my shoulder as I have experienced with a couple of other bags. Unlike the larger version this bag does not have an outside bottle holder. There is one small pocket on the side. So far it does the trick. My one wish is that the strap would have a come apart clip in the front so when you use it as a cross body bar you can just open the clip.
customer_reviews.author: Pat & Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Convenience personified
customer_reviews.text: This bag is marvelous. The large pockets are nice and roomy, with enough small pockets so keys, cell phone, pens, etc., don't get lost under larger things like books, tablet, or (and now you know I'm not a spring chicken) knitting project. The single cross-body strap allows it to sit comfortably but securely in place, whether walking, hiking, or riding a bike. I bought the large size, in purple, and the color is very strong and attractive, and the size is perfect for everything from a day hike to a trip to town. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Design
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for a specific purpose, because of the layout of the design. It is the perfect size, and the vertical orientation is just right for the way I use it. Inside the flap is the quick draw open ipad space, the back space is just right for a common 8 1/2 X 13" clipboard or two. Plenty of compartments for the other stuff everywhere. If you look at this design in the media, and think it might be the right design for you, you will probably be very pleased with your purchase. It is a good value and is a good looking product. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Levon Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sling Bag
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really like this sling bag. Con: I don't like the out pocket secured with the snaps. Very poor design. I had to use bread ties to secure the straps with the snaps. Pro: I can carry plenty of stuff (see image), with room to spare for sandwich, 8-inch tablet, another large battery pack (30000mAh) ... small hand towel, lots of keys, several bungie cords ... a third bottle of water/juice (out pocket), hat.
customer_reviews.author: vja4Him

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This thing is amazing. I purchased the small size. I wanted a bad that was smaller than a backpack that I could use everyday to carry essentials. This delivers. I was actually able to fit my MacBook pro 13” with its charger inside as well. It was a close fit but I was pleasantly surprised. I’ve gotten so many compliments too! All the other guys at my work want one too! Material and quality is great. I am a small guy (5’2” 140lbs) and the small size doesn’t feel like a backpack. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, I really like this bag
customer_reviews.text: I realize this is technically considered a "men's bag" but I love it. I can use it cross-body or hang it off one shoulder very comfortably like a purse. The size is small but still large enough to carry everything you really need. It's about 1/3 smaller (space) than a traditional women's computer should/briefcase/tote style bag. But the smaller size prevents me from carrying around load of excess stuff I don't really need. Plus, the bag looks good in addition to being functional.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Peach

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bag is almost perfect. Needs a couple pen pockets in the zippered pocket area under the flap. Put a magnetic snap on first pocket under the flap. And just a little more padding on shoulder strap. Now the pro’s.... its well crafted, design is great and sturdy. Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag so much!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag I bought for my husband to use as his free carry on flying with spirit. This is considered a free carry on. It is very high quality and WE both love it so much. It has so much room and pockets in this bag. We got the large green one with brown details. It’s beautiful. I now ordered me one. I just ordered another one in the light bright green!!! You will love this bag. It’s amazing for both male and female I got my green bag and 🥰 I love it
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Grihorash

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me organized!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love love this bag! I am a project manager for a construction company and on the go quite a bit... My oversized previous bag was a bottomless pit... I ordered this bag in a fit of frustration as I tossed my other out.... It came within a couple days and it has been the best thing ever... Plenty of room, lots of easily accessible pockets (some zippered, some snap, some open...) and it works! I bought another one for my daughter .. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: No complaints, awesome bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this messenger bag as an alternate to my narrow backpack. Depending on my journey, this messenger bag is easier to quickly get into than my backpack, while even keeping it on my shoulder. I absolutely love this bag. I’ve received so many compliments on the look. It has a lot of space and doesn’t feel overly big or small. It’s perfect for me. I saw negative comments about the magnetic straps, but I think they hold very well. I really don’t have any complaints about this product. Perfect for what I need! I recommend the coffee colored bag. Very nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The buckles and other furniture are all sturdy and useful as well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this specifically for a family vacation, and it worked out perfectly! I have shoulder issues, which is why I went with a sling bag in the first place, and the ability to switch sides really helped. The size is fairly small, but it can fit a lot of notebooks and small or medium electronics. The buckles and other furniture are all sturdy and useful as well, though I question the placement and size of some of the straps. Overall, I'm VERY happy with this bag, and continue to use it to carry necessities for work.
customer_reviews.author: Pax

customer_reviews.title: Nice over the shoulder Pack
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my phone, and other gear that would end up bulging my pockets out. Great zippers and plenty of room for a tablet. Comfortable to carry on your shoulder too. I like the front with the magnetic snaps. I can throw my DSLR in it when I need with no worries.
customer_reviews.author: The Professor

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like is shown
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large gray bag and what I got was so far off from the color pictured it almost looked brown. I immediately packed it back up and started a return. Should have known better, I've seen this bag listed under different "brand names" and it seems leaper is just another one of those brands that buys this particular make/model of bag from some random company/manufacturer (most likely in China) and just sells it. Maybe I should have went with black and I would have gotten gray instead.
customer_reviews.author: Prenumbra

customer_reviews.title: Spacious pockets!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight for carrying. I bought the purplish color and it's exactly as represented on Amazon. The pockets are big and deep. This is the 3rd bag I purchased. Had to return one of them b/c the pockets were so shallow. Amazon or Seller needs to include pocket depths. The canvas material is not thing or flimsy. It feels rugged enough. The outer buckles are magnetic. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M&S 6059

customer_reviews.title: Call it a LIFE bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this bag is classic in design with the surprise of a really beautiful color. It is very well made & becomes softer and more flexible with use. This bag is not as big as a backpack, but is still roomy enough for overnight flights, holding my neck pillow & rolled pashmina, snacks, tooth brush, necessary travel size toiletries, tablet, electronics chargers, some fresh clothes AND all the essential 'purse/wallet stuff', too. It fits easily under the seat & is easy to carry in several different ways. I definitely recommend this versatile bag. When not traveling, I use it for errands to carry purchases, and day trips with the kids. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Wheels

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Useful
customer_reviews.text: This item is one of the best buys my husband ever made for himself. It has so many discrete pockets that he can separate and organize all his many items that he likes to carry around. It is so stylish that we have had men on the street, in Dr. offices and libraries stop him to ask where he got it, compliment him on the bag and ask the brand. REALLY some men have been REALLY FASCINATED by it's looks and usefulness. It's comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: S. B. Boesen

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a purse she likes!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my wife who's needed a new purse for a long time but is very particular. After using a for a few weeks she says she really likes it a lot. She says she tends to store a whole lot less s*** in it now.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Not as Described
customer_reviews.text: The bag for the most part looks and is as described except for one thing, the mesh bottle holder pocket is not there!! I purchased this bag instead of another bag that was just like this one solely because it had the additional mesh bottle holder pocket on the side of the bag. The other bag that did not have the mesh pocket was over seven dollars cheaper. I know I could return it but I decide I would just keep it and instead worn you folk about the omission. So go for the cheaper bag that is the same in all details but the mesh pocket!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Brown

customer_reviews.title: I carry this and you love me.
customer_reviews.text: So, this single strap backpack makes me look really cool infront of the tree hugging hipster kids. I claim I'm a minimalist that needs no man in my life (i'm a straight man). I can do some stuff with it, I went hiking with it, and it is well made and makes me want to be a professor with glasses and go teach a class about sun-bathing. it's overall nice.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, very handy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something that I can use to carry around the various pieces of junk I need to carry (wallet, phone, iPad, sunglasses, chargers, etc.), especially in the warmer months when I can't wear a coat with pockets. I love this little cross-body backpack because it is large enough to not look ridiculous while holding everything I need, but small enough to be easy to transport. I wouldn't recommend it as a school or book bag, but it's great for carrying around day-to-day stuff without having to resort to using a Murse.
customer_reviews.author: Art & Home

customer_reviews.title: I finally had to do it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a student in college and this is perfect for it. I used to have a jansport backpack thinking it was perfect for it as jansports aren’t large backpacks. I also always use one strap as I’m always just going to my car. So I figured I would get this and I was right to do so. This backpack is perfect for fitting books and all the folders you need for class. It’s also thin at the same time which is perfect for a lot of my classes that fit us in like sardines sometimes. It has all the pockets you need and a comfortable strap for one shoulder carry. This is what convenience is all about.
customer_reviews.author: dima

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sling bag! I was looking for to down-size my purse. With all the COVID precautions, I haven't needed to carry my entire wallet, checkbook & all the things I typically keep in my handbag, but instead I've just been carrying the minimum--my debit card, ID, phone, keys, mask, and lip balm. I was getting by with a much smaller crossbody bag. Then I decided I wanted also to be able to carry a book with me for those times I'm sitting and waiting in my car or in a waiting room. This bag meets my needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Homeschooling mom of 3.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, durable, well made for healthy body mechanics
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite purse. Excellent construction. Hangs well on my body from multiple positions for hands free use. Easy to carry from top strap or cross body strap. At a recent conference, able to get my kindle, laptop and IPad in it with cords. I use the front zipper area for keys. Kleenex and sunglasses go next pocket back. Large interior compartment. Small open pockets I use for checkbook and I phone. Interior zippered pockets and a large open internal pocket which I periodically use for documents. Can carry a load without shoulder/body aches. Side pockets a little narrow, but can carry a narrow water bottle or umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Ruralcindy

customer_reviews.title: Great bag that can be used for everything!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I originally bought this bag to carry my art supplies in when traveling and it does an amazing job. It has plenty of compartments that make it easy to organize my art supplies and being able to transfer it from one shoulder to the other easily makes long-distance trips easier. I would also recommend this bag to those of you who enjoy hiking. Overall this bag is wonderful for the price and I would definitely recommend this bag to others.
customer_reviews.author: Shine

customer_reviews.title: This'll be my everyday bag. Love all the pockets!
customer_reviews.text: This is really an attractive bag. I got the large. I could've purchased the smaller bag as the large is pretty spacious. I can easily hold my ipad etc in it. I think I could even use it as an away day bag. Its ideal for travelling - easily holding your documents, water, folding umbrella, tablets, mac or laptop and all the other junk you may carry around. I live the pockets. Pockets galore! Good find on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: DANO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent man-bag ... daily goto.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is excellent. I use it every day to work, recreation etc. Holds a 13" laptop (think) and other items. Usual load includes second phone, keys, iPad-pro, pens, notebook, wires cables etc. Bag has held up well over the past months. No rips, tears or zipper issues. Not as big as a messenger bag, but for my use, much better. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TrickT

customer_reviews.title: It carries what I need it to, but the strap is a bit uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Size wise, this pack is perfect for what I needed. It carries a journal, Surface & charger, pens, etc. The reason for 3 stars is that gravity always wins and the padded part of the strap slides down your back. What that means is that you end up with an uncomfortable strap hanging on your shoulder, and after a couple of hours, it REALLY gets awful. I like the pack and I'll use it from time-to-time, but overall, I'm a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Thowc

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag, exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack purse, ordered a Large in grey and its perfect! Had to get away from PU Leather purses whose surfaces wear away and flake off, so the canvas material of this is awesome. Just the right number of pockets, plenty of room for anything I need to carry, very well structured (no slumping over and things tumbling out of place)! Overall, this is really great quality and I absolutely love the look of it. If I were to do anything different, I'd buy the smaller size- more purse-like, less backpack- but by no means am I disappointed by this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Oak

customer_reviews.title: Decent build, but magnetic latches suck
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoulder strap, space, build and most of the design, with the exception of the magnetic latches. They just don’t work. They are not easy to connect and don’t stay closed very well. With the effort required to connect them I would have been better to use snaps that had more strength. Velcro would have been the best choice...easy to use and strong enough. Build and space is good...just hate the magnetic latching.
customer_reviews.author: Bable

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a camera bag. I researched camera bags and didn't find one I liked, so I went with this bag. I used it every day all day for 3 weeks. It is still in great shape; good construction. The 4 star vs 5 star is because small issues. 1) the elastic netting, is not nearly as durable as the bag itself; its fraying. 2) The upper part (the wide part) of the shoulder strap needs to be about 4-6 inches longer. It didn't completely fit comfortably over my shoulder. 3) the buckles on the outer flap are upside down. Im overall pleased with it and would recommend it, well worth the amount spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag, I carry it almost everywhere. It would be everywhere, but it slides to a bad position and wants to fall off my shoulder all the time and that gets a little frustrating, so I'll leave it in the car on occasion. Other than that, it appears to be quality made. The materials of the bag and its snaps and zippers are much better than my previous bag. It has a bunch of pockets for organization needs.
customer_reviews.author: Remmy

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is everything I hoped for! I got the larger size in blue The good: -For a small bag it fits a lot in it! This morning I packed my 14 inch work laptop, my 10 inch iPad, various personal items, and lunch -It’s more stylish than a lot of other sling backpacks I’ve seen -The smaller form factor is nicer on my back and shoulders than my other bulkier bags The bad: -Should have been obvious, but the sling style makes it so this bag sits across my back at an angle. It hasn’t been a problem yet, but I worry about my travel mug falling out of the side pocket.
customer_reviews.author: kneedeep

customer_reviews.title: Looks great wears nicely and stores everything
customer_reviews.text: Omg this was a a good find for me after so many other bags lol Love it for the size weight and wear around my body. Zippers feel great and it has all the space and compartments you need for everything you have. This fits my iPad mini iPhone and the cords plus like... everything else without worry. ONLY complaint- buckle clasps are magnetically attatched and will fall off anywhere if bumped- you will lose them trust me. They aren’t needed though and I was just kinda like ... “wtf why would they design it like that lmao” But who cares I love this bag and would by something else from this brand
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Well made bag
customer_reviews.text: I like all of the storage space this bag has given it's size. I laptop will fit in this easily, I know that I carry several books and other items in mine and I have plenty of room left over. This bag seems like it would be ideal for a day hiker who just needs to bring a few essentials along. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cope

customer_reviews.title: This is the Backpack I've Been Searching For!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is FANTASTIC! I have been looking for a convenient but also stylish messenger bag to use while traveling. This bag is perfect! It has just the right amount of pockets in all the right places to easily access things like boarding passes, passports, and it holds just the right amount of books and my iPad! It's an EXCELLENT carry-on travel bag!
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Water bottle won't fit in the side pouch
customer_reviews.text: Only two things keep this from being a perfect bag: (a) the shoulder strap is not long enough and (b) despite what the marketing material says, a water bottle won't fit in the side pouch. I really like everything else, and I could put an extension on the strap, but a water bottle still won't fit in the side.
customer_reviews.author: C. JORDAN

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, not large enough
customer_reviews.text: My son really wanted a messenger type back pack for school (he's in 6th grade). We ordered the large one and it's pretty small. It's great for a small laptop and maybe a couple of small notebooks, but not practical for a 6th grader. It's a great quality bag and my son wants to keep it for other uses. The only reason I'm giving it 3 stars is that I think they should probably label it as a medium bag, not a large.
customer_reviews.author: carolina fernandez

customer_reviews.title: versatile bag
customer_reviews.text: We got this bag to replace a one-shoulder bag that was wearing out. It's for my disabled son and he loves it. It has more than enough pockets for everything and room for a good-sized tablet. He carries water everywhere and it has a side mesh pocket for that too. The bag itself is sturdy and well-made which is good as he carries a lot of stuff around with him sometimes. So far we both love it!
customer_reviews.author: pianogirl

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks size bag ... Just right
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bag that would fit my work tablet and just a few extras, without worrying a ton of being sloppy. The large size version of this bag did the trick. The tablet dimension they reference in the description was helpful in selecting the right size of the product for my tablet. I also like that it has a shoulder strap that can be set for either right or left shoulder use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ehinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, lotsa pockets, great for weekends, travel, outings
customer_reviews.text: We're enjoying this bag. Not suitable as a replacement for a purse but great for outings and travel (perfect for using in boating as it holds a lot of stuff). Good for 1-2 persons but not stuffed to the gills as it gets too bulky. Army green color very neutral, doesn't hold onto dirt and scuffs. All pockets, zippers function well, takes a bit of getting used to as it is carried over one shoulder - front or back. Priced right, after shopping for a very long time, we're glad we got it!
customer_reviews.author: KBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bag now!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough how much I love love love LOVE this bag! It holds everything i need and then some. Its very sturdy and even water resistant! Its comfortable to carry and I highly reccomend it. I've had mine for a long time now and it still nearly new looking even with all the abuse i put it through, including surviving a canoe trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley May

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrific — recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for plane travel — I wasn’t taking my laptop, so I didn’t want my bulky briefcase. It’s on the small side, but I packed two books, an iPad, snacks, charging cords, and medicines, and still had plenty of room for more. Perfect number and configuration of pockets; I especially appreciated the front zip pocket for earbuds & Dramamine, and the small interior zip pocket for keys. It turned out to be so ideal that I’m now using it as my everyday bag, and it’s holding up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and Lots of Pockets
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of this bag. It has lots of pockets for me to put my cell phone, Airpods, keys, and everything else I need. The color isn't exactly what I expected - it's a little more taupe than gray. But it's still neutral enough to go with most everything I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leather pieces not good quality. Not comfortable with one strap. But the medium bag is a good size.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice medium bag and it's big enough but not too big. BUT the small "leather" pieces are not good quality. I imagine I'll have to take them off, once they start pealing, and replace it with something else. It's also not very comfortable to wear across or just on one shoulder. It feels like it would feel more natural to carry it with 2 straps.
customer_reviews.author: P. S.

customer_reviews.title: This little bag is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller bag than your standard backpack, for running errands, or taking a small sketchbook or book to the park. This bag is perfect!! It has a ton of pockets, and nicely holds a standard paperback book, or my 8x10 inch sketchbook and a pencil case. I also really like the look of the canvas design, and it’s very sturdy (I’ve taken it out a bunch of times on full-day activities.) I’d HIGHLY recommend this bag for someone looking to carry a few things without having to deal with all the extra room in a standard backpack. 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Love this little bag.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first almost three years ago and loved how it held up so much that I got another. The one on the right is my old on. The one on the right is the new one. I’ve used it for my constant back and forth traveling over seas and for hiking/mountain climbing. Plus everyday use. It’s comfortable and the perfect size. Fits a lot in it but doesn’t hurt your back or shoulder when it gets heavy. Comfortably fits an IPad.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Woolston

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag and it holds everything that I need it to hold. It has the option to hang right or left and has a loop to attach it to a larger bag. The pockets are a great size. The canvas is thick and sturdy. I believe it will last for a few years. The reason for 4 out 5 stars is I would prefer to have snaps instead of magnetic closures for security purposes. Also, I would prefer to have had a padded laptop pocket, even though the maker clearly states it isnt padded.
customer_reviews.author: Seneca waterman

customer_reviews.title: Favorite New Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is small and tidy, but it holds SO much stuff. I had a vertical messenger bag I used to use that held my computer but not much else. I can put my laptop, the power brick and cord, an iPad pro, a huge coffee mug, an umbrella, and my lunch and it holds it all perfectly. It seems a little like magic that it can fit so much. Quality is good so far. Couldn't be happier - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: this thing is small.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is small calling them medium and large bags is a very misleading size guide. The medium would be more of a small and the large a medium. It is well made and rugged material. to call a bag large should beable to fit a 15" laptop.
customer_reviews.author: luckykismat86

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Well worth the price. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day at work. The only negative is the strap doesn’t stay at the length I put it but that is easily resolved. Otherwise the quality is above expectations and the durability is too! If I purchase another the only change might be the color, otherwise I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: 16 year old boy approved
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool and we'll constructed bag. My 16 year old son loves it and uses it daily for walking around town with his friends. He carries his piano practice stuff with him when he walks to piano and his magic cards when heading out to play a game with friends. He says it holds a lot and is not so big it feels like a regular backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda U.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little bag to use as a personal item on a plane. It works well for a book, IPad and a couple snacks. I can't even fit a lightweight folded jacket in it. I use it as a substitute for a purse when I travel so I can hold my essentials and the stuff my husband hands off to me that he doesn't want to carry
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: My only issue..the orientation of the strap, while adjustable from left to right at the bottom, is dead center at the top. Excellent for my work bag, helps limit the amount of stuff I carry. Comfortable to carry as an everyday bag, can fit my wallet and pistol easily, with room to spare. May order the smaller one for my everyday bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well put together and surprisingly roomy
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a day but already enjoying it. I wanted something that could hold my MS Surface Pro, charger, a couple of books and notepads. This handles all of those and has more room. In the one photo is my Surface with a Moleskine notebook laying sideways, there is clearly lots of room in this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Just big enough to fit a beefy textbook with a few extra notebooks, tablet, snacks, water bottle, etc without being bulky. The style is great and pairs well with almost anything and all of the pockets make it super easy to organize everything. UPDATE: After one year of every day use as a medic student the bag is holding up great and looks better than ever! I had to do a minor repair on the side mesh bottle holdue due to the stitching starting to come loose but other than that I still use it every day and still love it!
customer_reviews.author: JosiahE.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice in person!
customer_reviews.text: This bag looks perfect for my kids art bag. It fits a standard large size sketch book and so many spots for pencils and supplies. I got the large and glad I did, as it is smaller than I thought it would be. But this was the size I was looking for.. so I was happy with that.. gave it 4 stars because I think they make it seem larger than it is.. and my kid hasn't received it yet so not sure about durability. But color (army green) is spot on and it's really cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack and I use it as a purse daily. It's very convenient for me and all the things I have to do.
customer_reviews.author: jamie ojan

customer_reviews.title: This very handsome bag got me through a weeklong vacation ...
customer_reviews.text: This very handsome bag got me through a weeklong vacation in Los Angeles and surrounding area. It held an iPad mini, a Samsung phone, pens, a pad, sunglasses, small souvenir purchases, sunscreen, a bottle of water, and more. It was handy in a wide variety of situations: strolling along Venice Beach, visiting the Reagan Library, taking photos in Joshua Tree National Park, and visiting various sites in L.A. When it was time to board the plane again, the bag was small enough to nest inside my larger shoulder bag. It could use a longer strap, but the one it has was adequate for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Suz in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. It was complimented the first time I used it. It’s large enough to fit my iPad and Pixlebook, but still small enough to be a compact and light weight choice for day trips, carrying essentials, etc. Lots of compartments, comfortable, and stylish. A great alternative to a traditional backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't used it yet, it feels durable and is attractive. I got the smaller one and it does feel quite small. I plan to use it on my trip instead of a purse so I can forget about it and I think it will do the trick. *Update I used it on a weeklong trip and it performed very well. Very sturdy with a lot of pockets to hold everything needed. I'm so impressed with the construction! Zippers seem high quality also. I'd recommend the larger size if you want a full size backpack
customer_reviews.author: Tamar Kranz

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It's built well, has lots of pockets, and is fashionable. The only things I don't like (and it's a rather minor complaint) are the ornamental buckles and straps on the main flap and on the bottom. They serve no function, and they actually just kind of get in my way. They hide magnetic clasps, which don't always keep the bag closed. Maybe it's just the way I use the bag. I don't know. Not saying I don't like it, just saying I don't love it. One nice touch, I will add, is the small pocket on the side, which is very appropriate for storing keys. All in all, glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Donavan Russell

customer_reviews.title: Tons of room for a convenient size bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It's super convenient...I got this for my iPad mini for work. Going out on sales calls and service appointments, this has really helped me stay organized and coworkers have actually complimented me. As a guy, I was worried it would look feminine...it doesn't. I also put my lunch in here to take to the office. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Moffitt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous value for a bag in this size & style. One large compartment holds most items, but a smaller section is divided to add a quick-grab area behind magnetic clasps. The bag seems durable after a few months of use. It is a must for me on the go to hold my painting equipment and other items for work.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyMac

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Bag!
customer_reviews.text: As a Pastor, Chaplain and Evangelist, I love this bag! I can fit my Bible, tablet, bottle 9f water and many other supplies in it with room to spare. Has a lot of pockets and the single over the shoulder strap is great! It also has a handle so it can be carried. I get a lot of compliments on this bag and plan on purchasing more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: ajbeck280

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag. I get tons of complaints on it and since its mane of canvas you can put pins and patches on it to customize your look! Holds so much including papers wallet, iPad, etc.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag, but watch for defects
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag! But, I wasn't able to get it out of the box and use it in time to still send it back for a replacement. The material around the top zipper is sewn wrong and catches in the zipper. Every. Single. Time. I'm so disappointed, because that makes is very annoying to use. But, it's so convenient that I put up with that.
customer_reviews.author: Lee C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag.
customer_reviews.text: First thoughts: small. I loved the ability to swap sides and all the pockets. It grew on me. It's stylish. I can literally spend a weekend out of the bag. Lots of pockets and organization for my daily life trumps any bulkiness everytime. It won't fit anything bigger than a SMALL laptop or iPad, but its the right size for a few folders and a book. (And medicine, a few toiletries, chargers, pens, sharpies, highlighters, etc and it keeps it ORGANIZED)
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Happy but...
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag. My car broke down so I am on public transportation and I needed something streamlined and close to my body. The only thing is that when I received it, the top of the pack the stitching was coming undone or it was incomplete. But I needed to use it ASAP so I Just dealt with it
customer_reviews.author: Bleu Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Not a "Murse" it's a Man Bag - Looks good, made well
customer_reviews.text: It was designed well and holds a lot, looks good and isn't wimpy. I like it and while the straps are a little odd getting used to, I moved them into new buckles on the product and felt secure. I used this all over Santa Fe and didn't feel girly-girl at all. It held my iPad and my stuff easily. Went through TSA fine.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Marin

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag that I'm using to carry my work laptop. I'm not sure about the size difference between the large and medium but the large is fairly small compared to the photos. It's much smaller than the usual backpack. It holds my laptop, clipboard, and a few other things in the main compartment. The other zippers and pockets are helpful though.
customer_reviews.author: Kameron704

customer_reviews.title: Very useful stylish bag.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, not too big not too small. I'm not to happy with the magnetic straps only because I prefer the real thing BUCKLES. But still nice looking bag. Holds everything I need for work, lunch box, 20oz thermos, etc. The adjustable strap allows me to wear it over a motorcycle jacket or just throw it on over my scrubs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great daypack!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something smaller, but was having problems giving up taking my iPad Pro and Macbook Pro with me everywhere. This little bag holds all of that, and more! It's well made, seems very sturdy and should last a long time. It's a "sweeeeeet" deal for the price! Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Allcorn

product_meta.title: Leaper Retro Messenger Bag Canvas Shoulder Backpack Travel Rucksack Sling Bag
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :9.4 x 3.4 x 12.4 inches; 1.54 Pounds
 * Item model number :BP3060
 * Department :Unisex-adult (luggage only)
 * Date First Available :November 24, 2015
 * ASIN :B018FJHKO6

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #8,670 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #3 inMessenger Bags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars3,929 ratings
feature_bullets: Material: Soft and durable Washed Canvas with PU Leather Decoration. The messenger sling bag is made of a very durable looking canvas material on the outside and a softer, more luxurious material inside the main compartment. NOTE: We have updated the tag, two tags are randomly sent. We appreciate your understanding.

Size: 9.4*12.4*3.4 in (L*H*W). The shoulder bag can fit a 10" tablet. This canvas backpack is a mini backpack, but it is a great size to take to a day trip or shopping. The bag can be either carried with the hand handle or adjustable shoulder strap. Weight: approx. 710g. The full length of the strap: approx. 41in.

The canvas backpack is vintage and multifunctional with lots of pockets. 1 zipper pocket is in the front flap; 1 zipper pocket and 1 open pocket are under the flap; 1 side pocket. The main compartment is fitted with two zip heads and pulls: 1 inner zipper pocket; 1 inner laptop pocket; 2 inner small pockets. A small laptop, iPhone, wallet, snacks, tickets and magazine will all fit comfortably with room left over for add-ons.

The buckles on the top flap open and close easily and keep everything very secure. The zipper pocket on the top flap can put tickets and passport for easy access. The strap is adjustable and ultra-comfortable across your back and chest. It can act as a single-shoulder bag/sling bag, or a cross-body bag for use.

Stylish, Unisex and Effective: It is a nice little bag for school, college, working, dating, shopping and traveling in daily life. Although it is not waterproof, it can also be carried for outdoor activities, such as running, cycling, camping, etc. It is a great gift for your friends and family.
